column4: ok so I am a day old in linux... so please no harsh comments. I'm just trying to learn...
how do I install a deb file?
I'm trying to install aMSN Madpilot

good luck btw :).  I'm learning myself, being buggered silly by the fact I can't seem to figure out how to list installed packages :P  you'd think it'd be an important function that almost every 'newbie' page would have on it :P
